conbody.p: The release notes for Euca2ools are divided by release number, presented in order from current release to past releases. If you are already using Euca2ools, you can check updates from your older release and compare it with a later release.

section.title: Where to Download Euca2ools
section.p: To download the latest version of Euca2ools, go to Helion Eucalyptus Downloads.

section.title: Eucalyptus Compatibility
section.p: For information about which Euca2ools version is compatible with your version of Eucalyptus, see .
